name: micro-panel
description: An admin panel for websites that support microformats2 and micropub

scripts.lint: eslint --ignore-path .gitignore . && echo ESLint OK; polylint --input index.html && echo Polylint OK; true
scripts.build: rm -rf dist.new; broccoli build dist.new && mkdir -p dist && rm -rf dist/* && mv dist.new/* dist/ && rmdir dist.new

author: Val Packett <val@packett.cool>
